card.title: RESTless: Web APIs After REST
card.description: Web APIs are the backbone of the modern web, but the ever-evolving landscape demands a rethink. This article explores alternatives to the traditional REST approach, diving into solutions like GraphQL, gRPC, and WebSockets. Unlock the full potential of your APIs and discover a world beyond REST!
